Mevenide provides simple wizards to help creating ready-to-be used maven projects and poms. You can access it through the standard "File > New > Other..." and "File > New > Project..." (Screenshot 1).
Screenshot 1 Maven oriented wizards

Complementarily with the Create POM action, Mevenide provides a more flexible yet simple POM wizard (Screenshot 2). This allows user to have more control on the created POM. For now only identification attributes can be customized.
Also a template can be used at creation time. If no template is used, then all identification informations are to be filled.
Screenshot 2 Maven Pom wizard

Mevenide provides simple wizard (Screenshot 3) based on java project wizards for creating Maven-based projects. Convenient source and output folders are already filled in, and upon commit, a POM skeleton will be created. in the future the wizard will be more flexible allowing to specify the POM more precisely.
Note that this one suffers from some issues with Eclipse versions greater than 3.0 RC2 so you might not be able to use accurately. We're working on fixing it.
Screenshot 3 Maven project wizard
